isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 25-SI SERIES, TYPES 400 AND 450 - REPAIR PROCEDURES - REGULATOR REPLACEMENT

svcproc.title: REGULATOR REPLACEMENT
svcproc.para: If alternator component checks previously outlined indicate that regulator is faulty, replace the regulator.

After disconnecting the three identically colored regulator leads (Item 10, Figure 6), the regulator may be replaced by removing the attaching screws and disconnecting the regulator lead (Item 10), Figure 6) from the heat sink.

Some 24 and 32-volt regulators have a permanently-connected separate transistor mounted on the rectifier end frame. Regulators may differ in appearance, but the various types are completely interchangeable.
